setSource

void setSource(java.lang.String source)
Set the source (path + file-name).

Parameters:
source - The source-object.

getSource

java.lang.String getSource()
Get the source (path + file-name).

Returns:
The source-object.

getSourcePath

java.lang.String getSourcePath()
Get the source-path. If the source is a file, than the path within the file-system is returned.

Returns:
The source-path.

getSourceName

java.lang.String getSourceName()
Get the source-name. If the source is a file, than the file-name (without it's path) is returned.

Returns:
The source-path.

setSourcePath

void setSourcePath(java.lang.String path)
Set the source-path.

Parameters:
path - The new source-path.

setSourceName

void setSourceName(java.lang.String name)
Set the source-name (i.e. file-name - must end with '.agent.xml' or '.society.xml').

Parameters:
name - The new source-name (must end with '.agent.xml' or '.society.xml')

isSaved

boolean isSaved()
Return whether the document is saved or not.

Returns:
true, if this document is saved as it is (without any pending changes), false otherwise.

setSaved

void setSaved(boolean isSaved)
Set whether the document is saved or not.

Parameters:
isSaved - true, if this document is saved as it is (without any pending changes), false otherwise.
